all body parts and sew together sew the head on for the hair measure off lengths twice as long as you need fold in half and use a small crochet hook to loop yarn through the scalp put the yarn ends through the loop and pull tightly repeat until your molly has enough hair after the hair is put on carefully trim the length and trim her some bangs note use the larger hook for all her clothes dress
